alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 19 at 1:31PM PDT until March 21 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 75 to 85 mph possible. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds will continue into Tuesday evening. The Winter Storm Watch will begin at 5PM Tuesday, so please see the LAXWSWSGX (Winter Storm Watch) for more information on the winds Tuesday evening.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
